txt.en: 'Floodwend is a long way from my own home of Eaworth, in the Entwash Vale. I have only been here once or twice. Harding of Harwick is the Aldor of the Northmarch, and answers to Th√©oden King only for the defence of its people. This is among the rockiest stretch of the Wold, and the Great River flows swiftly south of the rapids.'
What do you know of this area?
